entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
